text.div:
Spirometry SNOMEDCT

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    127783003 Spirometry (procedure)
    165039000 Forced vital capacity normal (finding)
    165040003 Forced vital capacity abnormal (finding)
    165043001 Forced expiratory volume in one second/forced vital capacity ratio normal (finding)
    165044007 Forced expiratory volume in one second/forced vital capacity ratio abnormal (finding)
    171255006 Spirometry screening (procedure)
    251943006 Forced expired volume in one second/vital capacity ratio (observable entity)
    251944000 Forced expired volume in one second/forced vital capacity ratio (observable entity)
    251945004 Empey index (observable entity)
    258058009 Open spirometry (procedure)
    310360002 Expected forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity ratio (observable entity)
    310520004 Expected forced expired volume in 1 second (observable entity)
    310521000 Expected forced vital capacity (observable entity)
    313222007 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity percent (observable entity)
    313223002 Percent predicted forced expired volume in one second (observable entity)
    314472003 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity less than 70% of predicted (finding)
    314473008 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity greater than 70% of predicted (finding)
    314979004 Spirometry reversibility test (procedure)
    33875008 Spirometry for bronchospasm with prolonged evaluation (procedure)
    401012008 Forced expired volume in 1 second before bronchodilation (observable entity)
    401013003 Forced expired volume in 1 second after bronchodilation (observable entity)
    401016006 Forced expired volume in 1 second post steroids (observable entity)
    401115007 Forced expired volume in 1 second pre steroids (observable entity)
    407561008 Forced vital capacity after bronchodilation (observable entity)
    407576000 Forced vital capacity/expected forced vital capacity percent (observable entity)
    407599001 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity ratio pre steroids (observable entity)
    407601004 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity ratio post steroids (observable entity)
    407602006 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced vital capacity ratio before bronchodilator (observable entity)
    407603001 Forced expiratory volume in one second/forced vital capacity ratio after bronchodilator (observable entity)
    50834005 Forced vital capacity (observable entity)
    59328004 Forced expired volume in 1 second (observable entity)
    702534005 Forced expiratory volume in one second/Forced expiratory volume in six seconds ratio (observable entity)
